exam_name: CSIR NET (Council of Scientific and Industrial Research National Eligibility Test)
eligibility: MSc or equivalent degree in Science streams (Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Mathematics, Earth Sciences, etc.).
age_limit: 28 years for JRF; no limit for Lectureship (LS).
selection_process: Online Computer-Based Test (Single Paper with 3 parts).
description: CSIR NET determines eligibility for Junior Research Fellowship and lectureship positions in science disciplines across Indian universities and laboratories.

exam_name: UGC NET / JRF (University Grants Commission National Eligibility Test)
eligibility: Postgraduate (55% for General, 50% for reserved). Final-year PG students may apply.
age_limit: 30 years for JRF; no limit for Assistant Professor.
description: UGC NET determines eligibility for Assistant Professorship and Junior Research Fellowship in Indian universities and colleges.
salary_range: ₹37,000–₹45,000 for JRF; UGC pay scale for faculty.

description: GPAT is a national-level entrance exam for admission to MPharm programs and for recruitment in pharmaceutical research projects.

exam_name: ICAR AIEEA / JRF / SRF (Indian Council of Agricultural Research)
eligibility: Undergraduate: 10+2 with Agriculture/Science; PG: Bachelor’s in Agriculture/Allied Sciences.
selection_process: Computer-Based Test for UG, PG, and JRF levels.
description: ICAR AIEEA/JRF/SRF exams select candidates for agricultural universities and research fellowships across India.

exam_name: IGNOU / DU / JNU Non-Teaching Recruitment (NTA Conducted)
selection_process: Written Exam (Tier I & II), Skill Test, Document Verification.
description: NTA conducts recruitment for various non-teaching roles in central universities like DU, JNU, and IGNOU, covering clerical, administrative, and library posts.

eligibility: UG: 10+2 passed; PG: Bachelor’s in relevant subject.
job_roles: Admission to Central / State / Private Universities
description: CUET is a unified entrance exam for admission to undergraduate and postgraduate programs in central and state universities across India.

eligibility: D.El.Ed / B.Ed or equivalent teaching qualification.
description: CTET is a mandatory eligibility test for teaching posts in central government schools such as KVS, NVS, and CBSE-affiliated institutions.
salary_range: As per government teacher pay scales.
